title: IOC awarded contract for four procurements of Diesel and Petrol
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has awarded the contract for four procurements of Diesel and Petrol to the Indian Oil Corporation Limited.

According to the Department of Government Information bids were invited for four procurements to purchase Diesel and Petrol under the USD 200 Million short-term loan facility provided by the Export-Import Bank of India.
The recommendation of the Cabinet appointed Special Standing Procurement Committee was approved by the Cabinet of Ministers.
IOC awarded contract for four procurements of Diesel and Petrol
Eid Mubarak : Sri Lankan Muslims celebrate Eid ul-Fitr (Ramazan) today (3)
